description: This file defines a React component 'Logo' that renders animated SVG elements using Remotion, including imported components 'Arc' and 'Atom', and uses external libraries like zod for schema validation. It includes external references to 'remotion', 'zod', and '@remotion/zod-types'.

methods.name: Logo
methods.description: React functional component that creates an animated logo with rotation and scaling effects using Remotion hooks and springs.
